name: DURATECH Strap Wrench 12" Handle, Adjustable Nylon Strap Pipe Wrenches, Oil Filter Strap Opener Wrench
short_description: Usual Size: Handle length is 12 Inches, strap width is 3 cm, strap length is 99 cm and strap thickness is 2 mm
Anti-slip Strap: Made of linen cloth, which is sturdy. It provides a firm grip without scratching the pipe surface
I-beam Handle: The lightweight aluminum I-beam handle's design provides excellent weight distribution for comfortable grip

For Narrow Space: The strap wrench has a simple structure and is easy to assemble and use. Compared with ordinary pipe wrenches, strap wrench works in tight confined areas and is ideal for use on any polished pipe and can be used on plastic or metal pipes, fittings, filters, shafts, and irregular shapes
Wide Application: Great for handling automobile, tractor, oil filter, rubber joint, shower, can opener, bottle and so on, bring convenience to your daily life

name: Proferred Plumbing Adjustable Wrench, Black Phosphate Finish, 4 Available Size Options 6-inch, 8-inch, 10-inch, 12-inch - T08004
short_description: JAW CAPACITY - 55% wider jaw opening than traditional wrenches, opens to 2.44"
SUPER THIN - Head is super thin allowing for use in limited and narrow spaces
JAW DEPTH - Deep throat, height of jaw is 30% higher than standard wrenches.
COVERAGE - Ideal for use in Plumbing, Automotive, Installation and Gas fitting industries
product_description: Proferred Plumbing Adjustable Wrench, Phosphate Finish, 12",Phosphate, T08004.

name: Donext 12 Inch Adjustable Wrench Professional Hand Tool Soft Handle
short_description: Heavy duty with drop forged and heat-treated carbon steel which is for rust and corrosion resistant.
Precision-machined jaw for accurate fastener. High quality worm gear for smooth adjustment.
Durable soft rubber handle for comfortable operating. Essential tool for your car, bicycle or almost every home jobs.
1 in. Jaw capacity.
Lifetime Warranty - If you meet any problem while using the adjustable wrench, please contact us and we will solve your problem.

name: MAXPOWER Adjustable Wrench Set, Forged, Heat Treated, Black Phosphate Finish Adjustable Wrenches, 4 Pack (6-inch, 8-inch, 10-inch, 12-inch)
short_description: Max Jaw Capacity: 20 mm for 6" (150 mm) adjustable wrench. 25 mm for 8" (200 mm) adjustable wrench. 30 mm for10" (250 mm) adjustable wrench. 35 mm for 12" (300 mm) adjustable wrench
Load Strengthening Design: The torque range of this shifting wrench set (150 mm plumbing spanner is 191 NM. 200 mm is 356NM. 250 mm is 594 NM.300 mm is 1009 NM. )
Improves Work Efficiency: 15-degree angle head and thinner jaws of this slim shifting spanner set give a greater access in tight spaces. Black Phosphate finish resists corrosion
Dual-Sides Scale: Dual measurement scales (Metric on front, SAE on reverse.) are easy to read and handy for sizing nuts, pipes and tube diameters
Application: These small small adjustable wrenches can be used on all types of bolts, nuts or pipe and good at gripping, holding, twisting for plumbers,construction workers, mechanics and DIY

Premium quality drop forged and hardened chrome alloy steel.

name: Bahco 9073 R US Adjustable Wrench Ergo, 12-Inch, Black
short_description: 12 inches long
Black phosphate finish
Precision hardened and anti corrosion treated
Slim head with tapered jaws combine easy accessibility with extra turning strength
Ideal for plumbers or electricians and maintenance workers
product_description: BAHCO 12 inch ergo adjustable wrench has a black phosphate finish and features the true ergo design, with a thermoplastic handle and larger grip width. This particular wrench is ideal for plumbers, electricians, and maintenance workers. It features a slim head with tapered jaws that combine easy accessibility with extra turning strength. This wrench is precision hardened, anti corrosion treated and has a measurement scale on the head which conveniently shows fastener size.

name: Jetech 12-Inch Adjustable Wrench - Professional Heavy Duty Chrome Vanadium Steel Shifter Spanner with Inch/Metric Scale Wide Caliber Opening
short_description: QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - Made with heat-treated chrome vanadium steel for lasting strength and durability.
WIDE CALIBER - Up to 40mm opening caliber allows a great range of applications.
SMOOTH ADJUSTMENTS - High quality parts ensure smooth adjustments and tight grip to screws and nuts.
LASER PRINTED SCALE - Easily measure nut/bolt size at the jaw of the wrench.
VERSATILE USE - Ideal for a wide range of applications, from automotive repair to household maintenance.
